Name: Description
Text: Your draconic heritage manifests in a variety of traits you share with other dragonborn.

Name: Description
Text: Your dwarf character has an assortment of inborn abilities, part and parcel of dwarven nature.

Name: Description
Type: Your elf character has a variety of natural abilities, the result of thousands of years of elven refinement.
Text: Your elf character has a variety of natural abilities, the result of thousands of years of elven refinement.

Name: Description
Text: Your gnome character has certain characteristics in common with all other gnomes.

Name: Description
Text: Your half-elf character has some qualities in common with elves and some that are unique to half-elves.

Name: Description
Text: Your half-orc character has certain traits deriving from your orc ancestry.

Name: Description
Text: Your halfling character has a number of traits in common with all other halflings.

Name: Description
Text: It’s hard to make generalizations about humans, but your human character has these traits.

Name: Description
Text: Tieflings share certain racial traits as a result of their infernal descent.

Name: Description
Text: As a rock gnome, you have a natural inventiveness and hardiness beyond that of other gnomes.

Name: Description
Text: As a high elf, you have a keen mind and a mastery of at least the basics of magic. In many fantasy gaming worlds, there are two kinds of high elves. One type is haughty and reclusive, believing themselves to be superior to non-elves and even other elves. The other type is more common and more friendly, and often encountered among humans and other races.

Name: Description
Text: As a rock gnome, you have a natural inventiveness and hardiness beyond that of other gnomes.

Name: Description
Text: As a lightfoot halfling, you can easily hide from notice, even using other people as cover. You’re inclined to be affable and get along well with others. Lightfoots are more prone to wanderlust than other halflings, and often dwell alongside other races or take up a nomadic life.
